articles.title: UPS Driver Fired After Customer Claims He Spit on Package - TMZ
articles.description: Did this guy actually spit on the package???
articles.content:
A UPS driver is now out of a job after a customer claimed she caught him spitting on a package on her doorstep -- but whether he actually hocked one or not is up for debate.

articles.title: Flight attendant warns US travelers NOT to take vouchers if they get bumped from a full flight - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sandra Jeenie Kwon worked as a flight attendant for Emirates . In a recent TikTok video, she warned people traveling from the US not to take a voucher if they get involuntarily bumped.
articles.content:
A former flight attendant has warned travelers in the US not to take vouchers if they are ever involuntarily bumped from a full flight because they're entitled to cold, hard cash.

articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.title: An absolutely wild mod has brought real-time ray tracing to the SNES - The Verge
articles.description: Programmer Ben Carter has brought real-time ray tracing, a cutting-edge graphics technology, to the SNES, a 30-year-old console.
articles.content: It offers a new look at a unique art style
